entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `new FileStream(fd,..., isAsync:true)` doesn't appear to be supported on Unix #85560
  • crash with 0x8007000E error on .NET 7.0 #85556
  • Support loop cloning with non-int iteration variables #85552
    Future
  • Extraction of non-loop blocks during loop recognition uses questionable condition #85550
    Future

Closed

  • Mono: Crash when accessing a field of a null class object #82535

PullRequests

Created

  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop passing around struct handles in importer #85561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allocate Array.Empty<> on a frozen segment (NonGC heap) #85559
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove cached Type instances #85557
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Revert "[mono][llvm] Enable the cold calling conv on osx/linux. (#835… #85554
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Implement Vector128.Shuffle using tbl1 on arm64. #85553
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512

Merged

  • Simplify some importer code #84656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors when reverse GT_JCC. #85555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Set lvSingleDef for non TYP_REF locals #85398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [browser] es6 test main #85542
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Cleanup some xarch emit logic #85536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Emission and reading of custom modifiers #85504
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `OBJ(LCL_ADDR)` args handling from local morph ref counting #85544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix/31527 invalid currentculture applying #85297
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: Improve block unrolling, enable AVX-512 #85501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: one phi arg per pred #85546
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Prefer lld in NativeAot when using clang #85478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Make optAssertionPropGlobal_RelOp less conservative for side-effects #85532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Global Usings for Console Apps #32130

PullRequests

    untriaged
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

    Area-AspNetCore

    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29

    Backlog

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense cannot detect IAsyncEnumerable's yield return type when that parameter is used #68027
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68026
  • Revise IDE0035 (unreachable code analyzer) being run in command-line builds #68025

Closed

  • Unable to compile project with large amount of grpc proto messages and services #67912

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix number of additional overloads on lambda parameter's member recommendations #68028
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Interceptors: address duplicate interceptions feedback, handle nameof, add test coverage #67971
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Check ILegacyGlobalOptionsWorkspaceService is null in GenerateConstructorFromMembersCodeRefactoringProvider #68024
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to add a client certificate in a SocketsHttpHandler? #47988
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47987
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, plaintext #47986
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #47985
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, plaintext #47984
  • asp.net core bin folder on publish to group all binaries #47982
  • Should MapShortCircuit matches for all methods or only GET? #47981
  • ControllerBase Route attribute is ignored in dynamically loaded AssemblyParts #47980
  • Make ProblemDetailsDefaults public #47978
  • Perf improvement: json #47977
  • code-generator run twice creates CS0433 #47976

Closed

  • Make ProblemDetailsDefaults public #47822
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #47725
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #47929

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fewer `System.Exception` #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Could not resolve assembly on .NET MAUI App project template and System.IO.FileNotFoundException #14844

Closed

  • Azure DevOps build failure: "The app references non-public selectors in Payload/AppDev.xxx.app/AppDev.xxx: setOrientation:animated: (ID: 701d936c-b52e-4dae-8823-bec4e8848c61)" #14823
  • Maui/Blazor Windows net7.0-windows10.0.22621.0 App Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll missing on Build and Publish. #13728

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding some tests for the baseline #14846
  • Backport some net8.0 changes to main #14843
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net6.0] Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14842
  • [net7.0] Make .NET MAUI (Blazor) templates project based #14841

Merged

  • [android] MauiTextView doesn't need ViewAttachedToWindow #14833
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [android] AOT profiles for .NET 8 Preview 4 #14838
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Platfrom/Android: fix toolbar text color #14800
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar
  • [net8.0] Merge latest main to net8 #14826
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [controls] improve performance of {Binding} #14830
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using postgres enum types generates migration files that depends on the clr enum type #30796
  • Unable to run dotnet ef migration add on debian 10 #30795

Closed

  • EF Core generates wrong column name in migration for foreign key column in one to many relationships using PropertyAccessMode.Field configuration #30792
  • Allow default value check in value generation to be customized #701
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Reintroduce the SDK workaround for OSX on Helix #30790
  • Improve collection indexer normalization #30780
  • Allow configuration of the sentinel value that indicates a property has not been set #30760

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30575 - Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30794
    Servicing-consider
